00167 #define DOTCONF_FLAGS                           NONE
00168 #define DOTCONF_NO_CONTEXT_CHECKING     NULL

00175 typedef struct {
00177         char lock_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00179         char console_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00181         char link_module_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00183         char link_config_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00185         char net_module_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00187         char net_config_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00189         char unreliable_module_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00191         char unreliable_config_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00193         char reliable_module_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00195         char reliable_config_file[CONFIG_LENGTH];
00196 } kurud_config_t;
00197 
00201 static configoption_t options[] = {
00202         {KEYWORD_LOCK_FILE, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00203         {KEYWORD_CONSOLE_FILE, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00204         {KEYWORD_LINK_MODULE, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00205         {KEYWORD_LINK_CONFIG, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00206         {KEYWORD_NET_MODULE, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00207         {KEYWORD_NET_CONFIG, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00208         {KEYWORD_UNRELIABLE_MODULE, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00209         {KEYWORD_UNRELIABLE_CONFIG, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00210         {KEYWORD_RELIABLE_MODULE, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00211         {KEYWORD_RELIABLE_CONFIG, ARG_STR, handle_file, NULL, CTX_ALL},
00212         LAST_OPTION
00213 };

00224 int kurud_configure(char *file_name) {
00225         configfile_t *config_file = NULL;
00226         int code;
00227 
00228         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00229 
00230         if (file_name == NULL) {
00231                 file_name = CONFIG_FILE;
00232         }
00233 
00234         /* Empty the current configuration. */
00235         memset(&current_config, 0, sizeof(kurud_config_t));
00236 
00237         config_file =
00238                         dotconf_create(file_name, options, DOTCONF_NO_CONTEXT_CHECKING,
00239                         DOTCONF_FLAGS);
00240         TRY(NULL != config_file, ERROR(REASON_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND, file_name));
00241         liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "configuration file opened %s", file_name);
00242 
00243         config_file->errorhandler = (dotconf_errorhandler_t) handle_error;
00244 
00245         TRY(dotconf_command_loop(config_file) != 0, ERR(REASON_CONFIG_PARSING));
00246         liblog_info(MODULE_DAEMON, "configuration file parsed");
00247 
00248         TRY(check_config_sanity(), ERR(REASON_CONFIG_SANITY));
00249         liblog_info(MODULE_DAEMON, "configuration file sanity checked");
00250 
00251         code = KURUD_OK;
00252 end:
00253         if (config_file != NULL) {
00254                 dotconf_cleanup(config_file);
00255                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "resources used by dotconf cleaned.");
00256         }
00257         return code;
00258 }
00259 
00260 void kurud_unconfigure() {
00261         memset(&current_config, 0, sizeof(kurud_config_t));
00262 }

00264 char *kurud_get_lock_file() {
00265         return current_config.lock_file;
00266 }
00267 
00268 char *kurud_get_console_file() {
00269         return current_config.console_file;
00270 }
00271 
00272 char *kurud_get_module_file(int layer) {
00273         switch (layer) {
00274                 case LAYER_LINK:
00275                         return current_config.link_module_file;
00276                 case LAYER_NET:
00277                         return current_config.net_module_file;
00278                 case LAYER_RELIABLE:
00279                         return current_config.reliable_module_file;
00280                 case LAYER_UNRELIABLE:
00281                         return current_config.unreliable_module_file;
00282         }
00283         return NULL;
00284 }
00285 
00286 char *kurud_get_module_config(int layer) {
00287         switch (layer) {
00288                 case LAYER_LINK:
00289                         return current_config.link_config_file;
00290                 case LAYER_NET:
00291                         return current_config.net_config_file;
00292                 case LAYER_RELIABLE:
00293                         return current_config.reliable_config_file;
00294                 case LAYER_UNRELIABLE:
00295                         return current_config.unreliable_config_file;
00296         }
00297         return NULL;
00298 }

00304 void set_lock_file(char *name) {
00305         strncpy(current_config.lock_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00306 }
00307 
00308 void set_console_file(char *name) {
00309         strncpy(current_config.console_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00310 }
00311 
00312 void set_module_file(int layer, char *name) {
00313         switch (layer) {
00314                 case LAYER_LINK:
00315                         strncpy(current_config.link_module_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00316                         break;
00317                 case LAYER_NET:
00318                         strncpy(current_config.net_module_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00319                         break;
00320                 case LAYER_RELIABLE:
00321                         strncpy(current_config.reliable_module_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00322                         break;
00323                 case LAYER_UNRELIABLE:
00324                         strncpy(current_config.unreliable_module_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00325                         break;
00326         }
00327 }
00328 
00329 void set_module_config(int layer, char *name) {
00330         switch (layer) {
00331                 case LAYER_LINK:
00332                         strncpy(current_config.link_config_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00333                         break;
00334                 case LAYER_NET:
00335                         strncpy(current_config.net_config_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00336                         break;
00337                 case LAYER_RELIABLE:
00338                         strncpy(current_config.reliable_config_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00339                         break;
00340                 case LAYER_UNRELIABLE:
00341                         strncpy(current_config.unreliable_config_file, name, CONFIG_LENGTH);
00342                         break;
00343         }
00344 }

00346 int file_exists(const char *name) {
00347         FILE *file = NULL;
00348         int code;
00349 
00350         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00351 
00352         TRY(file = fopen(name, "r"), goto end);
00353 
00354         code = KURUD_OK;
00355 
00356 end:
00357         if (file != NULL)
00358                 fclose(file);
00359         return code;
00360 }
00361 
00362 DOTCONF_CB(handle_file) {
00363         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_LOCK_FILE) == 0) {
00364                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "lock_file parameter found.");
00365                 set_lock_file(cmd->data.str);
00366                 return NULL;
00367         }
00368 
00369         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_CONSOLE_FILE) == 0) {
00370                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "console_file parameter found.");
00371                 set_console_file(cmd->data.str);
00372                 return NULL;
00373         }
00374 
00375         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_LINK_MODULE) == 0) {
00376                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "link_module parameter found.");
00377                 set_module_file(LAYER_LINK, cmd->data.str);
00378                 return NULL;
00379         }
00380 
00381         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_LINK_CONFIG) == 0) {
00382                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "link_config parameter found.");
00383                 set_module_config(LAYER_LINK, cmd->data.str);
00384                 return NULL;
00385         }
00386 
00387         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_NET_MODULE) == 0) {
00388                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "net_module parameter found.");
00389                 set_module_file(LAYER_NET, cmd->data.str);
00390                 return NULL;
00391         }
00392 
00393         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_NET_CONFIG) == 0) {
00394                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "net_config parameter found.");
00395                 set_module_config(LAYER_NET, cmd->data.str);
00396                 return NULL;
00397         }
00398 
00399         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_RELIABLE_MODULE) == 0) {
00400                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "reliable_module parameter found.");
00401                 set_module_file(LAYER_RELIABLE, cmd->data.str);
00402                 return NULL;
00403         }
00404 
00405         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_RELIABLE_CONFIG) == 0) {
00406                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "reliable_config parameter found.");
00407                 set_module_config(LAYER_RELIABLE, cmd->data.str);
00408                 return NULL;
00409         }
00410 
00411         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_UNRELIABLE_MODULE) == 0) {
00412                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "unreliable_module parameter found.");
00413                 set_module_file(LAYER_UNRELIABLE, cmd->data.str);
00414                 return NULL;
00415         }
00416 
00417         if (strcmp(cmd->name, KEYWORD_UNRELIABLE_CONFIG) == 0) {
00418                 liblog_debug(MODULE_DAEMON, "unreliable_config parameter found.");
00419                 set_module_config(LAYER_UNRELIABLE, cmd->data.str);
00420                 return NULL;
00421         }
00422 
00423         return NULL;
00424 }
00425 
00426 FUNC_ERRORHANDLER(handle_error) {
00427         switch (dc_errno) {
00428                 case ERR_PARSE_ERROR:
00429                         liblog_error(MODULE_DAEMON,
00430                                         "line %lu: parse error.", configfile->line);
00431                         break;
00432                 case ERR_UNKNOWN_OPTION:
00433                         liblog_error(MODULE_DAEMON,
00434                                         "line %lu: unknown option.", configfile->line);
00435                         break;
00436                 case ERR_WRONG_ARG_COUNT:
00437                         liblog_error(MODULE_DAEMON,
00438                                         "line %lu: wrong arguments count.", configfile->line);
00439                         break;
00440                 case ERR_INCLUDE_ERROR:
00441                         liblog_error(MODULE_DAEMON,
00442                                         "line %lu: included file not found.", configfile->line);
00443                         break;
00444                 case ERR_NOACCESS:
00445                         liblog_error(MODULE_DAEMON, "acess denied.");
00446                         break;
00447                 default:
00448                         liblog_error(MODULE_DAEMON, "unknown error.");
00449         }
00450 
00451         return 0;
00452 }
00453 
00454 int check_module_sanity(const char *parameter, const char *file) {
00455         int code;
00456 
00457         code = KURUD_ERROR;
00458         TRY(strlen(file) != 0, ERROR(REASON_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND, parameter));
00459 
00460         TRY(file_exists(file), ERROR(REASON_FILE_NOT_FOUND, file));
00461 end:
00462         return KURUD_OK;
00463 }
00464 
00465 int check_config_sanity() {
00466         /* Checks sanity of all module files. Config files for each module
00467          * are optional, so these parameters are not checked. */
00468         char sanity = (check_module_sanity(KEYWORD_LINK_MODULE,
00469                                         current_config.link_module_file)) &&
00470                                         (check_module_sanity(KEYWORD_NET_MODULE,
00471                                         current_config.net_module_file)) &&
00472                                         (check_module_sanity(KEYWORD_RELIABLE_MODULE,
00473                                         current_config.reliable_module_file)) &&
00474                                         (check_module_sanity(KEYWORD_UNRELIABLE_MODULE,
00475                                         current_config.unreliable_module_file));
00476 
00477         return sanity ? KURUD_OK : KURUD_ERROR;
00478 }
